item.title: Slow Motion at the Dog Park
item.description:
Slow Motion at the Dog Park

Uploaded by Mad Squid ProductionsTM on 2015-04-27.

item.title: Banfield Pet Hospital Scam
item.description:
Banfield Pet Hospital Scam

This is a recorded complaint call that I placed to my local Banfield Pet Hospital after being charged for an "Optimum Wellness Plan" for months following multiple cancellation requests, and even re-homing the dog that the plan was purchased for. Over the course of our wellness plan, we experienced multiple instances of poor business ethics on the part of Banfield.

item.title: Voter Suppression: Election Day 2012
item.description:
Voter Suppression: Election Day 2012

On election day 2012 I worked a 12-hour shift to get out the vote for President Obama at Colorado Mesa University. When I arrived at 7:00 a.m. there were Romney signs ALL OVER the grounds around the University Center. Being that CMU is a state school, and that the signs were surrounding the polling station, this was illegal.

item.title: U.S. Marine Corps and Department of the Navy
item.description:
U.S. Marine Corps and Department of the Navy

After getting into a day long argument with another YouTube user, MiloPepper, I felt compelled to make this video. The guy is delusional, and while I don't mean to pick on him, I feel that his beliefs are dangerous. He tried to call me, a decorated veteran who was serving on Active Duty when 9/11 went down, a COMMUNIST!

item.title: Google: "completely wrong"
item.description:
Google: "completely wrong"

Have you ever played around with Google? Have you ever Googled your own name? If you're a gamer, have you ever Googled your gamer id? Googling things can be a lot of fun. But it can be more than that too...

item.title: Conservative or Liberal?
item.description:
Conservative or Liberal?

Are you a conservative, or a Liberal? The true answer may not be what you think it is. Watch this video to discover a simple tool that will help you decide. Who knows? You might just be surprised by what you learn.

item.title: Navy Seal Joke
item.description:
Navy Seal Joke

This is an OLD video that I made with Flash that tells a quick Navy SEAL joke. Enjoy!

item.title: Miles Go Passing By (A Folk/Americana Music Video)
item.description:
Miles Go Passing By (A Folk/Americana Music Video)

Folk / Americana music written, performed, and recorded by Harold F. Easton. (My father.) NOTE ABOUT CARDS: The card included in this video links to the Association for Frontotemporal Degeneration (AFTD). They will gladly accept donations to help fund research and raise awareness.
